QuestData.Title: Not The Friendliest Town
QuestData.Description: Have you been up to Rustberg Village yet $n? I would suggest you bring a sharpened blade if you are heading that direction.$b$bThe folks in that town look alright but something suspicious is going on in there. Reports have been coming in that they are picking off our soldiers left and right. We have had just about enough of that, so I need you to head down there and do a little cleaning house for us.$B$BTake down as many as you can and report back when you are done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Larmash has asked you to kill 14 villagers in Rustberg Village. Rustberg Village is just north of base camp, on the right side.
QuestData.RewardText: Told you that village was full of wackos. Nice job clearing it out $n.
